mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `musicinfo` (`url`, `duration`, `title`, `artist`, `background`, `cover`)VALUES (#{mp3}, '2:21', #{title}, #{artist}, 'http://123.207.215.205/music/bgpic/bg.jpg', #{cover}); # INSERT INTO `music`.`musicinfo` (`url`, `duration`, `title`, `artist`, `background`, `cover`) VALUES ('http://123.207.215.205/music/music/yangcong.mp3', '2:21', '洋葱', '平安', 'http://123.207.215.205/music/bgpic/bg.jpg', 'http://123.207.215.205/music/bgpic/bg.jpg');
